item.title: Let's play with autoencoders (Keras, R)
item.description: What are autoencoders? How do we build them? Build it Step 1 - load and prepare the data Step 2 - define the encoder and decoder Step 3 - compile and train the autoencoder Step 4 - Extract the weights of the encoder Step 5 - Load up the weights into an ecoder model and predict Conclusion library(ggplot2) library(keras) library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ──────────────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.
